StructuredXMLResume.Objective:
Outgoing and detail-oriented, proficient at building and maintaining professional relationships. I believe in ensuring transparency, accountability, performance efforts by being an effective interface that aids business and technology for decision making.


Currently working as a Sr. Engineering Manager, where I am responsible for 50 members' team driving effort towards end to end Product Development, Road Map Delivery from Planning till Post production.

Being a Senior Leadership Team (SLT), my main focus areas are Strategic Planning, Team Management, Relationship Management, Product Development, Risk and Control with Production support.

Having hands-on experience in Agile with Scrum and Kanban, Waterfall, and Iterative in SDLC model.
I am also responsible for the DevOps, and Agile delivery with all required automated Tools and Technologies.

PositionHistory.Title: Delivery Head
PositionHistory.Description:
* Involved in Global Product Technology Budgeting and in Key Decisions for India and SEA region
* Define and manage the roadmap, setting and continuously managing the right expectations with all relevant stakeholders including the senior leadership team
* Achieved effective deliveries by forming DevOps, Strong customer focus, results driven and team oriented
* Identifies process improvements and communicates them to the PMO Head and Architects programs
* Ensured project outputs are consistent, high-quality on time and within budget to all business objectives

JobCategory.CategoryCode: Information Technology → Operations, Monitoring and Software Management
JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 27% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
* Perform analysis that leads to continuous improvement and transformational projects for the business
* Partnered with appropriate functional leaders to manage resources for projects
* Supported assignments outside of new product development as required and worked with Cross Functional Teams
* Responsible for the oversight of the Project Management Office, Change management, Production Support/Maintenance, Database Administration and Release Management
* Oversee team's activities to provide impact assessment and subject knowledge, Drive partnerships, joint GTM models with key partners to drive scale in the marketplace

PositionHistory.Title: Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
* Responsible for Product, and IT portfolios which includes Applications, Databases, Release and Infrastructure Management
* Responsible for the overall performance, availability and optimization of virtualized environments, servers, networks etc.
* Proactively evaluate servers and identifying for reduction, consolidation and virtualization.
* Manage Incidents and Problems with regards to Application and DC.
* Ensure compliance with patch management policy.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 75% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Application Support / Team Leader
PositionHistory.Description:
* Work with business analysts and product owners to understand the requirements, use cases as part of the development team.
* Design and Develop the core logic with required validations using HTML, JQuery, and C#.Net.
* Develop the Data access layer with ADO.Net with SQL 2008R2 with a database as backend.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Support Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
* Incident Management and Problem Management
* Develop basic software tools like system configuration management, test enabling modules
* SQL SERVER

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 92% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Engineer Support
PositionHistory.Description:
* Installing, configuring, troubleshooting, and maintaining server equipment, switches, routers, backup devices, RAID devices, and software Maintaining Call desk
* Responsible for Installing and managing HP, IBM servers, Laptops, desktops and high end printers for large organization with more than 3000+ employees

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 50% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Customer Support Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
* IT Support, Network printers, Antivirus cleaning. Maintained zero network downtime.
* Assisted end users with problem relating to network, network printing, desktop, software installation, configuration, LAN and WAN.

JobCategory.Comments: Administrative or Clerical describes 80% of this job

Degree.Comments:
Examination	Year   Institute
Diploma	1996   DB Jain College - Electronics and Communication Engineering

PROJECTS and PRODUCTS Deliverables
Product Development and Expansion
* Upgraded the HCM, Payroll product to Cloud based version without impacting 1500+ clients.
* Release and Deploy Multi country solution catering India, Singapore, Philippines and other south-east countries like Maldives, Indonesia, SriLanka and Bangladesh with agreed Release Calendar.
* Involved in releasing native mobile apps for both Android and iOS and also for PWS-Progressive Web App which serving almost 400,000 records with end to end Pay, Leave and Tax.

Key Deliverables
* HCM India & SEA
* AWS Transitions and Product version upgrades & migrations.
* Standalone application to Cloud based application upgrade.
* Payroll, Leave, T&A, Performance management with Comprehensive reimbursement claims.
* Compliance management, statutory rules and end to end Employee Exit management system.

Domain Knowledge
* India & SEA Payroll, HCM
* Indian Stats and Regulatory rules with compliance Management.
* Country specific deductions, law of land.

Achievement.Description: Product Expansion across South East Asia region (Worth: $ 25 M)
Product platform migration for South East Asia region around 1500+ clients with record size of 0.5 M
AWS Transition around 20 Applications with 5000 Live databases with record size of 0.5 M
Deployed Centralized MIS using analytics for business reporting
Data Center consolidation 12 locations to a single location
20% growth in efficiency through Automation Projects

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
RAMKAMAL AV	Ramkamal.Agastyaraju@gmail.com	+91-9677037747
            

OBJECTIVE
Outgoing and detail-oriented, proficient at building and maintaining professional relationships. I believe in ensuring transparency, accountability, performance efforts by being an effective interface that aids business and technology for decision making.


Currently working as a Sr. Engineering Manager, where I am responsible for 50 members' team driving effort towards end to end Product Development, Road Map Delivery from Planning till Post production.

Being a Senior Leadership Team (SLT), my main focus areas are Strategic Planning, Team Management, Relationship Management, Product Development, Risk and Control with Production support.

Having hands-on experience in Agile with Scrum and Kanban, Waterfall, and Iterative in SDLC model.
I am also responsible for the DevOps, and Agile delivery with all required automated Tools and Technologies.

Notable Accomplishments:
• Product Expansion across South East Asia region (Worth: $ 25 M)
• Product platform migration for South East Asia region around 1500+ clients with record size of 0.5 M
• AWS Transition around 20 Applications with 5000 Live databases with record size of 0.5 M
• Deployed Centralized MIS using analytics for business reporting
• Data Center consolidation 12 locations to a single location
• 20% growth in efficiency through Automation Projects


Employment History:

• ADP India PVT LTD [2005 to Present] - 14 Years
• Vitage Infoservices Pvt Ltd [2003 to 2005] - 2 Years
• Quantum International pvt ltd [2002 to 2003] - 1 Year
• JVR Infotech Private Limited [1999 to 2002]  - 3 Years

INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE

2014-2015
Sr. Manager

* Responsible for the oversight of the Project Management Office, Change management, Production Support/Maintenance, Database Administration and Release Management
* Oversee team's activities to provide impact assessment and subject knowledge, Drive partnerships, joint GTM models with key partners to drive scale in the marketplace

2012-2014
Manager
* Responsible for Product, and IT portfolios which includes Applications, Databases, Release and Infrastructure Management
* Responsible for the overall performance, availability and optimization of virtualized environments, servers, networks etc.
* Proactively evaluate servers and identifying for reduction, consolidation and virtualization.
* Manage Incidents and Problems with regards to Application and DC.
* Ensure compliance with patch management policy.

2005-2012
Application Support / Team Leader
* Work with business analysts and product owners to understand the requirements, use cases as part of the development team.
* Design and Develop the core logic with required validations using HTML, JQuery, and C#.Net.
* Develop the Data access layer with ADO.Net with SQL 2008R2 with a database as backend.

2003-2005
Sr. Support Engineer
* Incident Management and Problem Management
* Develop basic software tools like system configuration management, test enabling modules
* SQL SERVER

2002-2003
Sr. Engineer Support
* Installing, configuring, troubleshooting, and maintaining server equipment, switches, routers, backup devices, RAID devices, and software Maintaining Call desk
* Responsible for Installing and managing HP, IBM servers, Laptops, desktops and high end printers for large organization with more than 3000+ employees

1999-2002
Sr. Customer Support Engineer
* IT Support, Network printers, Antivirus cleaning. Maintained zero network downtime.
* Assisted end users with problem relating to network, network printing, desktop, software installation, configuration, LAN and WAN.

Skillset	Descriptions and Details
Analyzing and Documenting Skills
* SLA Document has been updated with new client and country base aligned with team size to maximize NPS scores and ensured client retentions.
* DR strategy documentations and updates made for easy disaster recovery plans for Business Continuity.
* Process Asset Library updates made with required Change Management process of important documents for Testing, CRs and ACL forms.
* Documents Repository has been maintained for historical project related documents to ensure smooth deliverables for any kind of projects with lessons learnt, checklist items prepared.

Application Development Skills
* C#.Net, ASP.Net with SQL Server 2008R2 and 2014/16.
* ADO.Net, Three Tier Architecture, and MVC
* WCF, Open API and PWA, Progressive Web App Development.
* HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, Angular.JS, PHP, REDIS and Mongo DB
* Windows and Linux Operating Systems

DevOps Management Skills
* TFS Build Agent, TFS Administration and Release Management.
* BitBucket, Jenkins, TFS Build, TFS Source Code Repository.
* CI and CD with TFS, Release Management Tool, Microsoft TFS 2015.
* Defining Build pipelines for Internal Lower environments
* Testing the Staging and Production environments with controls.

Problem Solving and Technical Support Skills
* Lead Support Team with Different time zones of India and SEA with shift modeling.
* Root Cause Analysis, Fish-bone, 5 Why Approach.
* Incident Management and Problem Management.
* Troubleshooting System and Application issues.

Change Management Skills
* Change Management Support, Scope Vs Delivery Gap Metrics, JIRA, Rally, and TFS Burn down charts.
* Plan, Schedule with Release Calendar and Resource allocation, WBS.
* Iterative and Incremental release plans.

Tools Used
* Visual Studio, TFS, BitBucket, JIRA
* SSRS and SharePoint Administration
* MS Project, Jenkins and Nagios, JFrog Artifactory, Rally and Ansible Basics
* SQL Server 2008 R2, 2012 and 2014
* IIS 7/7.5/8.0, Apache an Tomcat

EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION

Diploma	1996   DB Jain College - Electronics and Communication Engineering

* Upgraded the HCM, Payroll product to Cloud based version without impacting 1500+ clients.

* Involved in releasing native mobile apps for both Android and iOS and also for PWS-Progressive Web App which serving almost 400,000 records with end to end Pay, Leave and Tax.

Key Deliverables

* Standalone application to Cloud based application upgrade.
* Payroll, Leave, T&A, Performance management with Comprehensive reimbursement claims.
* Compliance management, statutory rules and end to end Employee Exit management system.

Domain Knowledge

* Country specific deductions, law of land.
